qas.question: Who has ignored the school issue?
Who gave instructions to ignore the school issue?
What media source has reported this happening?

context: <a2_0>The AP<a2_0/> reported that "The <a0_0>state-controlled media<a0_0/> has largely ignored the issue, apparently under the <a1_0>propaganda bureau<a1_0/>'s instructions. Parents and volunteers who have questioned authorities have been detained and threatened."
